MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_100: Design animated banners, movie clips and games.
Site.Site_Description_250: Design animated banners, movie clips and games. Add interactivity with JavaScript, TypeScript or Haxe.
Site.Site_Description_450: Design animated banners, movie clips and games. Add interactivity with JavaScript, TypeScript or Haxe. Any customizations of the result html/js are allowed.

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: WinXP,WinVista,WinVista x64,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Win2000,Windows2000,Windows2003,Windows Vista Ultimate,Windows Vista Ultimate x64,Windows Vista Starter,Windows Vista Home Basic,Windows Vista Home Premium,Windows Vista Business,Windows Vista Enterprise,Windows Vista Home Basic x64,Windows Vista Home Premium x64,Windows Vista Business x64,Windows Vista Enterprise x64,Windows 8,Windows Server 2012
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Shapes union bugfix. Automatic bug reports fix.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: The trial version of MySoftware can be freely distributed over the internet in an unchaged form.

Press_Release.Press_Release:
NanoFL vector and animation editor with a HTML5-backend

Design animated banners, movie clips and games.
Add interactivity with JavaScript, TypeScript or Haxe.
Any customizations of the result html/js are allowed.
Write application with your favorite framework JQuery.
Use Cordova to support mobile platform - feel yourself free!

Features:

  • Open and simple self-descriptive files format (`XML`)
  • Importing from Adobe Flash Documents (`*.fla;*.xfl`)
  • Vector graphics (based on edges, polygons and boolean operations)
  • Raster images in the Library and on the Scene (`png`/`jpeg`, rasterized `svg`)
  • Layers: groups, masks, tweens, guides
  • Effects: alpha, brightness, tint, advanced
  • Filters: Adjust Color, Blur, Drop Shadow, Glow
  • Linear and radial gradients, filling with a bitmap
  • Working with text on canvas (web fonts from local files and Google Fonts are supported)
  • Generating HTML on save (`CreateJSGenerator` plugin)
  • Generating project files for your favorite IDE on save (`CreateJSGenerator` plugin)
  • CreateJS-based generated code (`CreateJSGenerator` plugin)
  • Plugin system (Filters, Importers, Exporters, Generators)
  • Scale Mode support
  • Importing from SVG file format (`*.svg`)
  • Exporting into SVG file format (`*.svg`)
  • SpriteSheets / Texture Atlases in library (CreateJS/Zoe format is only supported for a while)
  • Generating Texture Atlases
  • Batch processing
  • Scripts support
  • Plugin system: Library Item Loaders
  • Plugin system: Publishers
  • Image & sound optimizations on publish
  • Publish into HTML
  • Publish into Apache Cordova
  • 3D objects support (rendering via ThreeJS)
  • ThreeJS support by CreateJS generator plugin
  • Blender 3D objects in the library (`*.blend`)

Credits

  • jQuery framework, jQuery Foundation
  • CreateJS framework, gskinner
  • Silk Icons, Mark James
  • XulRunner, Mozilla
Press_Release.Press_Release_Plain:
NanoFL vector and animation editor with a HTML5-backend
Design animated banners, movie clips and games. Add interactivity with JavaScript, TypeScript or Haxe. Any customizations of the result html/js are allowed. Write application with your favorite framework JQuery. Use Cordova to support mobile platform - feel yourself free!
Features:
Open and simple self-descriptive files format (`XML`) Importing from Adobe Flash Documents (`*.fla;*.xfl`) Vector graphics (based on edges, polygons and boolean operations) Raster images in the Library and on the Scene (`png`/`jpeg`, rasterized `svg`) Layers: groups, masks, tweens, guides Effects: alpha, brightness, tint, advanced Filters: Adjust Color, Blur, Drop Shadow, Glow Linear and radial gradients, filling with a bitmap Working with text on canvas (web fonts from local files and Google Fonts are supported) Generating HTML on save (`CreateJSGenerator` plugin) Generating project files for your favorite IDE on save (`CreateJSGenerator` plugin) CreateJS-based generated code (`CreateJSGenerator` plugin) Plugin system (Filters, Importers, Exporters, Generators) Scale Mode support Importing from SVG file format (`*.svg`) Exporting into SVG file format (`*.svg`) SpriteSheets / Texture Atlases in library (CreateJS/Zoe format is only supported for a while) Generating Texture Atlases Batch processing Scripts support Plugin system: Library Item Loaders Plugin system: Publishers Image & sound optimizations on publish Publish into HTML Publish into Apache Cordova 3D objects support (rendering via ThreeJS) ThreeJS support by CreateJS generator plugin Blender 3D objects in the library (`*.blend`)
Credits
jQuery framework, jQuery Foundation CreateJS framework, gskinner Silk Icons, Mark James XulRunner, Mozilla
Press_Release.Headline: NanoFL vector and animation editor with a HTML5-backend
Press_Release.Summary: NanoFL vector and animation editor with a HTML5-backend Design animated banners, movie clips and games. Add interactivity with JavaScript, TypeScript or Haxe. Any customizations of the result html/js are allowed.

English.Char_Desc_80: Vector and animation HTML5-editor. Design animated banners and games.
English.Char_Desc_250: Vector and animation HTML5-editor. Design animated banners, movie clips and games. Add interactivity with JavaScript, TypeScript or Haxe.
English.Char_Desc_450: Vector and animation HTML5-editor. Design animated banners, movie clips and games. Add interactivity with JavaScript, TypeScript or Haxe. Any customizations of the result html/js are allowed.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Vector and animation graphics editor with HTML5-backend. Design animated banners, movie clips and games. Use 2D or 3D objects to make your show. Add interactivity with JavaScript, TypeScript or Haxe. Any customizations of the result html/js are allowed. Write application with your favorite framework (like JQuery). Use Cordova to support mobile platform - feel yourself free! Importing from Flash (3D) and Blender (3D) are supported. NanoFL has also SVG editing feature: importing and exporting are supported.
